definition: Hualien, city and county on the east coast of Taiwan
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
surname Hua
lotus
Hualien County on the east coast of Taiwan
Hualien city on the east coast of Taiwan

sentences.english: In Hualien, we stayed at WZ Hotel.
sentences.chinese: 在花蓮，我地住五洲商務旅館。

sentences.english: We have three different Hualien travel deals. Would you like me to go over each one with you?
sentences.chinese: 我們花蓮有三種行程。我幫您詳細介紹一下吧？

sentences.english: A small crane for rail replacement at Hua-Lien Station.
sentences.chinese: 花蓮站內的鋼軌起重用鐵擔車。

sentences.english: The beach scene right outside of Hualian city.
LCK31 was displayed on the wall of Kuang- Long Marble Factory years ago, Hua-Lien County.
sentences.chinese: 還放在花蓮縣光隆大理石工廠牆上時的LCK31。

sentences.english: In Hualien, you can see the train runs under the river.
sentences.chinese: 在花蓮，你可以看到火車從河川底下穿過。

sentences.english: Cycling around the Hualien sea-front bike trail.
sentences.chinese: 悠遊於花蓮濱海自行車道內。

sentences.english: James:The sunrise at Hualien is also very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 我在花蓮看到的日出也很美麗啊。

sentences.english: Freight vehicles have been displayed at Hua-Lien Station.
sentences.chinese: 展示於花蓮車站前的舊臺東線貨車羣。

sentences.english: Many years ago, I went to Yan-liau, Hualien purposely.
sentences.chinese: 多年前，我曾特地到花蓮鹽寮去。

sentences.english: A study of user demand and satisfaction in the Hualian County sport park.
sentences.chinese: 其他書名以花蓮縣立運動公園爲例。

sentences.english: They contemplated taking a weekend trip to Hualien.
sentences.chinese: 他們考慮周未去花蓮度假。

sentences.english: Yes, first we'll go to Yilan, then to Hualien and finally to Nantou.
sentences.chinese: 決定好了，先去宜蘭，然後去花蓮，最後到南投。

sentences.english: Ray, how was the job fair you held last week in Hualien?
sentences.chinese: 我們上週到花蓮舉辦徵才活動，成效怎樣？

sentences.english: How far is it from here to Hualien？

definition: Taidong or Taitung city and county in Taiwan

Yilan city and county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], northeast Taiwan
Pingtung city, county and military airbase in south Taiwan
Jiayi or Chiayi city and county in west Taiwan
to tour/sightseeing/tourism
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
Lüdao or Lutao township in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
Kinmen or Quemoy islands off the Fujian coast, administered by Taiwan/Jinmen county in Quanzhou 泉州[Quan2 zhou1], Fujian, PRC
urban district/downtown/city center
Taroko gorge national park in Hualien County 花蓮縣|花莲县[Hua1 lian2 Xian4], Taiwan/Taroko ethnic group Taiwan
roundabout (traffic island)/around an island (trip etc)
Hengchun town in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Mt Yangming in Hunan/Mt Yangming in north Taiwan, near Taibei
scenic spot/place of interest (tourism)
Xiamen or Amoy, subprovincial city in Fujian, abbr. 廈|厦[Xia4]
